eduversum.name: Quanta Plus
eduversum.description: Quanta Plus is a development environment for creation of webpages. It offers project management and supports arbitrary markuplanguages but it focuses on web-based languages and technologies like HTML, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java or PHP. Quanta Plus supports a multitude of external komponents and tools, which support the development. Therefore Quanta provides a rich but still easy to use environment with which you can create and manage your websites fast and with efficiency.
